TEXT.Italian: In generale gli Sluga non sono portati al combattimento; sono lenti, privi di intelligenza e con riflessi molto scarsi. Pertanto inizialmente furono scartati come potenziale forza militare. Tutto questo cambiò quando un Sorvegliante di nome Karas comparve tra i ranghi Mekara. Lui riuscì per primo nel ricostruire uno Sluga in modo da compensare le sue innate debolezze, creando cosi gli Sluga da Battaglia. Sebbene sia richesto un addestramento supplementare per gestirli si sono rivelati utili come soldati per l'Ordine Mekara.
TEXT.Spanish: In general, Sluga are not well suited for battle; they are slow, unintelligent, and with very poor reflexes. Therefore, they were initially dismissed as a potential military force. This changed when an Overseer by the name of Karas appeared in the Mekaran ranks. He was the first to succeed in rebuilding a Sluga to compensate for their inherent weaknesses, and so created the Battle Sluga. While additional training is required to handle the strain of controlling them, they serve well as rank-and-file soldiers for the Mekara Order.

TEXT.English: The Battle Sluga line of units function like the regular Sluga in many respects; they are both useless without a commanding Overseer, and they don't get XP on their own. However, while the regular Sluga are made for construction, these are made for war. There are three tiers of Battle Sluga; the Battle Sluga, the War Sluga and the Behemoth. The Battle Sluga is made the same way Sluga are, by sacrificing a Slave in a city that has a Mage Guild, and are available at Alteration. The War Sluga are available as their upgrade at Sorcery, and the Behemoth can be created through a city spell at Arcane Lore.
TEXT.French: The Battle Sluga line of units function like the regular Sluga in many respects; they are both useless without a commanding Overseer, and they don't get XP on their own. However, while the regular Sluga are made for construction, these are made for war. There are three tiers of Battle Sluga; the Battle Sluga, the War Sluga and the Behemoth. The Battle Sluga is made the same way Sluga are, by sacrificing a Slave in a city that has a Mage Guild, and are available at Alteration. The War Sluga are available as their upgrade at Sorcery, and the Behemoth can be created through a city spell at Arcane Lore.
TEXT.German: The Battle Sluga line of units function like the regular Sluga in many respects; they are both useless without a commanding Overseer, and they don't get XP on their own. However, while the regular Sluga are made for construction, these are made for war. There are three tiers of Battle Sluga; the Battle Sluga, the War Sluga and the Behemoth. The Battle Sluga is made the same way Sluga are, by sacrificing a Slave in a city that has a Mage Guild, and are available at Alteration. The War Sluga are available as their upgrade at Sorcery, and the Behemoth can be created through a city spell at Arcane Lore.
TEXT.Italian: Gli Sluga da combattimento funzionano come i normali Sluga sotto molti aspetti; sono entrambi inutili senza un Supervisore che li comanda, e non ottengono PE per conto loro. Tuttavia, mentre gli Sluga normali sono fatti per costruire questi sono fatti per combattere. Ci sono tre livelli di Sluga da combattimento; gli Sluga da Battaglia, gli Sluga da Guerra e i Behemoth. Gli Sluga da Battaglia si creano come i normali Sluga, ovvero sacrficando uno Schiavo in una città con il Laboratorio del Modellatore, e si sbloccano con la tecnologia Alterazione. Gli Sluga da Guerra sono il loro miglioramento e si sbloccano con la tecnologia Stregoneria, e i Behemoth possono essere creati usando una magia nelle città una volta scoperta la tecnologia Conoscenza Arcana.
TEXT.Spanish: The Battle Sluga line of units function like the regular Sluga in many respects; they are both useless without a commanding Overseer, and they don't get XP on their own. However, while the regular Sluga are made for construction, these are made for war. There are three tiers of Battle Sluga; the Battle Sluga, the War Sluga and the Behemoth. The Battle Sluga is made the same way Sluga are, by sacrificing a Slave in a city that has a Mage Guild, and are available at Alteration. The War Sluga are available as their upgrade at Sorcery, and the Behemoth can be created through a city spell at Arcane Lore.

TEXT.English: While the Battle Sluga were constructed to serve as rank-and-file soldiers, the Behemoths were created to essentially be living siege engines. Massive constructs, made by fusing together multiple slaves into one being, they are made to strike fear into the hearts of the Mekara Order's enemies.
TEXT.French: While the Battle Sluga were constructed to serve as rank-and-file soldiers, the Behemoths were created to essentially be living siege engines. Massive constructs, made by fusing together multiple slaves into one being, they are made to strike fear into the hearts of the Mekara Order's enemies.
TEXT.German: While the Battle Sluga were constructed to serve as rank-and-file soldiers, the Behemoths were created to essentially be living siege engines. Massive constructs, made by fusing together multiple slaves into one being, they are made to strike fear into the hearts of the Mekara Order's enemies.
TEXT.Italian: Mentre gli Sluga da Combattimento sono fatti per essere normali soldati i Behemoth sono creati per essere delle macchine d'assedio viventi. Costrutti enormi creati fondendo più schiavi in un unico essere, il loro scopo è quello di incutere paura ai nemici dell'Ordine Mekara.
TEXT.Spanish: While the Battle Sluga were constructed to serve as rank-and-file soldiers, the Behemoths were created to essentially be living siege engines. Massive constructs, made by fusing together multiple slaves into one being, they are made to strike fear into the hearts of the Mekara Order's enemies.

TEXT.English: While the Battle Sluga can be either built or created by sacrificing a slave, the Behemoth can only be created through the Create Behemoth city spell, castable at Arcane Lore, which requires 4 units to be sacrificed. They must all be placed in the city for the spell to be castable, and they must all be of the Slave, Sluga, Battle Sluga or War Sluga unitclasses. The spell will give preference to slaves and regular sluga, and will only use Battle or War Sluga when nothing else is available.
TEXT.French: While the Battle Sluga can be either built or created by sacrificing a slave, the Behemoth can only be created through the Create Behemoth city spell, castable at Arcane Lore, which requires 4 units to be sacrificed. They must all be placed in the city for the spell to be castable, and they must all be of the Slave, Sluga, Battle Sluga or War Sluga unitclasses. The spell will give preference to slaves and regular sluga, and will only use Battle or War Sluga when nothing else is available.
TEXT.German: While the Battle Sluga can be either built or created by sacrificing a slave, the Behemoth can only be created through the Create Behemoth city spell, castable at Arcane Lore, which requires 4 units to be sacrificed. They must all be placed in the city for the spell to be castable, and they must all be of the Slave, Sluga, Battle Sluga or War Sluga unitclasses. The spell will give preference to slaves and regular sluga, and will only use Battle or War Sluga when nothing else is available.
TEXT.Italian: Mentre gli Sluga da combattimento possono essere costruiti o creati sacrificando uno Schiavo i Behemoth possono essere creati solo attraverso la magia da città 'Crea Behemoth', lanciabile dopo aver scoperto la tecnologia 'Conoscenza Arcana', che richiede di sacrificare 4 unità. Queste devono essere tutte presenti nella città per rendere lanciabile la magia, e devono essere Schiavi o Sluga (non importa il tipo). La magia consuma in maniera preferenziale gli Schiavi e gli Sluga normali, consumando Sluga da Battaglia o da Guerra quando non vi è altro a disposizione.
TEXT.Spanish: While the Battle Sluga can be either built or created by sacrificing a slave, the Behemoth can only be created through the Create Behemoth city spell, castable at Arcane Lore, which requires 4 units to be sacrificed. They must all be placed in the city for the spell to be castable, and they must all be of the Slave, Sluga, Battle Sluga or War Sluga unitclasses. The spell will give preference to slaves and regular sluga, and will only use Battle or War Sluga when nothing else is available.

TEXT.English: On their own, the Sluga are, despite their great endurance and strength, barely capable of conscious thought. While this does make them incapable of betrayal or disobedience, it also makes them useless. As a way to utilize their physical capabilities without granting them greater autonomy, the Mekara Order began training Overseers, who are skilled and experienced craftsmen, loyal to the Mekara Order, whose minds are augmented to the point where they can take control over the Sluga, once a link between them has been established. This link gives the Sluga access to the memories and skills of their Overseer, and ensures that the Overseer will always remain in control of any Sluga assigned to him.
TEXT.French: On their own, the Sluga are, despite their great endurance and strength, barely capable of conscious thought. While this does make them incapable of betrayal or disobedience, it also makes them useless. As a way to utilize their physical capabilities without granting them greater autonomy, the Mekara Order began training Overseers, who are skilled and experienced craftsmen, loyal to the Mekara Order, whose minds are augmented to the point where they can take control over the Sluga, once a link between them has been established. This link gives the Sluga access to the memories and skills of their Overseer, and ensures that the Overseer will always remain in control of any Sluga assigned to him.
TEXT.German: On their own, the Sluga are, despite their great endurance and strength, barely capable of conscious thought. While this does make them incapable of betrayal or disobedience, it also makes them useless. As a way to utilize their physical capabilities without granting them greater autonomy, the Mekara Order began training Overseers, who are skilled and experienced craftsmen, loyal to the Mekara Order, whose minds are augmented to the point where they can take control over the Sluga, once a link between them has been established. This link gives the Sluga access to the memories and skills of their Overseer, and ensures that the Overseer will always remain in control of any Sluga assigned to him.
TEXT.Italian: Da soli gli Sluga sono a malapena capaci di ragionare, nonostante abbiano una grande forza e resistenza. Sebbene questo li renda incapaci di tradire o disobbedire li rende anche inutili. Per fare in modo di utilizzare le loro capacità fisiche senza dargli maggiore autonomia l'Ordine Mekara iniziò ad addestrare dei Supervisori, i quali sono artigiani abili ed esperti e fedeli all'Ordine Mekara, le cui menti sono state potenziate sino al punto in cui possono controllare gli Sluga una volta che sia stato stabilito un collegamento. Questo collegamento fornisce agli Sluga accesso ai ricordi e alle abilità del loro Supervisore, e assicura che il Supervisore abbia sempre il controllo degli Sluga asseggniatigli.
TEXT.Spanish: On their own, the Sluga are, despite their great endurance and strength, barely capable of conscious thought. While this does make them incapable of betrayal or disobedience, it also makes them useless. As a way to utilize their physical capabilities without granting them greater autonomy, the Mekara Order began training Overseers, who are skilled and experienced craftsmen, loyal to the Mekara Order, whose minds are augmented to the point where they can take control over the Sluga, once a link between them has been established. This link gives the Sluga access to the memories and skills of their Overseer, and ensures that the Overseer will always remain in control of any Sluga assigned to him.

TEXT.English: The Overseer funtions both as a worker, and as a commander for Slave and Sluga units. The command skills he can aquire improves their workrate (to a greater degree with the Sluga), as well as providing new Build Orders for the Sluga.
TEXT.French: The Overseer funtions both as a worker, and as a commander for Slave and Sluga units. The command skills he can aquire improves their workrate (to a greater degree with the Sluga), as well as providing new Build Orders for the Sluga.
TEXT.German: The Overseer funtions both as a worker, and as a commander for Slave and Sluga units. The command skills he can aquire improves their workrate (to a greater degree with the Sluga), as well as providing new Build Orders for the Sluga.
TEXT.Italian: Il Supervisore funziona sia come lavoratore che come comandante per Schiavi e Sluga. Le abilità di comando che può acquisire migliorano il loro ritmo di lavoro (in misura maggiore con gli Sluga) oltre a permettere agli Sluga di contruire.
TEXT.Spanish: The Overseer funtions both as a worker, and as a commander for Slave and Sluga units. The command skills he can aquire improves their workrate (to a greater degree with the Sluga), as well as providing new Build Orders for the Sluga.

TEXT.English: With the creation of the Battle Sluga, a need for new Overseers to command them appeared. This need was met by the Combat Overseers. These mages were not only given training in how to dominate the psychic link between individual Sluga, but also given extensive combat training, which they can imprint on to any Battle Sluga they are linked to.
TEXT.French: With the creation of the Battle Sluga, a need for new Overseers to command them appeared. This need was met by the Combat Overseers. These mages were not only given training in how to dominate the psychic link between individual Sluga, but also given extensive combat training, which they can imprint on to any Battle Sluga they are linked to.
TEXT.German: With the creation of the Battle Sluga, a need for new Overseers to command them appeared. This need was met by the Combat Overseers. These mages were not only given training in how to dominate the psychic link between individual Sluga, but also given extensive combat training, which they can imprint on to any Battle Sluga they are linked to.
TEXT.Italian: In seguito alla creazione degli Sluga da Battaglia fù necessario un nuovo tipo di Supervisore per comandarli. Questa necessità fù soddisfatta dai Supervisori da Combattimento. Questi maghi non solo furono addestrati a gestire il legame psichico tra gli Sluga, ma vennero anche addestrati a combattere, in modo da imprimere negli Sluga a loro collegati queste conoscenze.
TEXT.Spanish: With the creation of the Battle Sluga, a need for new Overseers to command them appeared. This need was met by the Combat Overseers. These mages were not only given training in how to dominate the psychic link between individual Sluga, but also given extensive combat training, which they can imprint on to any Battle Sluga they are linked to.

TEXT.English: While frequent drills and extensive training can make someone a competent warrior, only experience will make a good tactician and leader. This is what sets these Combat Overseers apart from the rest; they have led Sluga in battle, and they have survived. This experience gives them an edge in combat, and it makes them more adept at controlling the Sluga assigned to them.
TEXT.French: While frequent drills and extensive training can make someone a competent warrior, only experience will make a good tactician and leader. This is what sets these Combat Overseers apart from the rest; they have led Sluga in battle, and they have survived. This experience gives them an edge in combat, and it makes them more adept at controlling the Sluga assigned to them.
TEXT.German: While frequent drills and extensive training can make someone a competent warrior, only experience will make a good tactician and leader. This is what sets these Combat Overseers apart from the rest; they have led Sluga in battle, and they have survived. This experience gives them an edge in combat, and it makes them more adept at controlling the Sluga assigned to them.
TEXT.Italian: Sebbene frequenti esercitazioni e allenamenti possono rendere qualcuno un guerriero competente, solo l'esperienza può rendere buoni tattici e leader. Questo è quello che differenzia questi Supervisori dagli altri; loro hanno guidato gli Sluga in battaglia, e sono sopravvisuti. L'esperienza ottenuta gli da un vantaggio in combattimento rendendoli maggiormente capaci di gestire gli Sluga assegnatigli.
TEXT.Spanish: While frequent drills and extensive training can make someone a competent warrior, only experience will make a good tactician and leader. This is what sets these Combat Overseers apart from the rest; they have led Sluga in battle, and they have survived. This experience gives them an edge in combat, and it makes them more adept at controlling the Sluga assigned to them.

TEXT.English: While in many cultures military service is entered into willingly, for one reason or another - usually to do with wealth, power or prestige - not all who serve in such armies do so of their own free will.
TEXT.French: While in many cultures military service is entered into willingly, for one reason or another - usually to do with wealth, power or prestige - not all who serve in such armies do so of their own free will.
TEXT.German: While in many cultures military service is entered into willingly, for one reason or another - usually to do with wealth, power or prestige - not all who serve in such armies do so of their own free will.
TEXT.Italian: Mentre in molte culture il servizio militare viene prestato di propria volontà per varie ragioni, di solito legate alla ricchezza, al potere o al prestigio, non tutti quelli che servono in tali eserciti lo fanno volontariamente.
TEXT.Spanish: While in many cultures military service is entered into willingly, for one reason or another - usually to do with wealth, power or prestige - not all who serve in such armies do so of their own free will.

TEXT.English: Professional armies are not the only way to handle defence of a nation, though they tend to be more reliable.
TEXT.French: Professional armies are not the only way to handle defence of a nation, though they tend to be more reliable.
TEXT.German: Professional armies are not the only way to handle defence of a nation, though they tend to be more reliable.
TEXT.Italian: Un esercito professionale non è l'unico strumento per difendere una nazione, sebbene tenda ad essere quello più affidabile.
TEXT.Spanish: Professional armies are not the only way to handle defence of a nation, though they tend to be more reliable.

TEXT.English: Available once the Magistrate's Office has been built, the Militia and Militia Crossbowman units are the basic defensive units of the Mekara Order. They are generally weaker than their equivalent units in other civs (Axeman and Archer, respectively), but in return they have no upkeep cost.
TEXT.French: Available once the Magistrate's Office has been built, the Militia and Militia Crossbowman units are the basic defensive units of the Mekara Order. They are generally weaker than their equivalent units in other civs (Axeman and Archer, respectively), but in return they have no upkeep cost.
TEXT.German: Available once the Magistrate's Office has been built, the Militia and Militia Crossbowman units are the basic defensive units of the Mekara Order. They are generally weaker than their equivalent units in other civs (Axeman and Archer, respectively), but in return they have no upkeep cost.
TEXT.Italian: Disponibili dopo aver costruito l'Ufficio del Magistrato, il Miliziano e il Balestriere Miliziano sono le unità difensive di base dell'Ordine Mekara. Sono generalmente più deboli dei loro equivalenti delle altre civiltà (Guerriero con Ascia e Arciere, rispettivamente), ma in compenso non hanno costi di manuntenzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Available once the Magistrate's Office has been built, the Militia and Militia Crossbowman units are the basic defensive units of the Mekara Order. They are generally weaker than their equivalent units in other civs (Axeman and Archer, respectively),but in return they have no upkeep cost.

TEXT.English: While the crossbow may require more advanced technology than the bow, it does have significant advantages. Ease of use combined with considerable stopping power can easily make this weapon turn the tide of a battle, epecially when deployed in large numbers.
TEXT.French: While the crossbow may require more advanced technology than the bow, it does have significant advantages. Ease of use combined with considerable stopping power can easily make this weapon turn the tide of a battle, epecially when deployed in large numbers.
TEXT.German: While the crossbow may require more advanced technology than the bow, it does have significant advantages. Ease of use combined with considerable stopping power can easily make this weapon turn the tide of a battle, epecially when deployed in large numbers.
TEXT.Italian: Sebbene la balestra possa richiedere una tecnologia più avanzata rispetto all'arco essa ha vantaggi significativi. La sua facilità d'uso unita al considerevole potere d'arresto gli permette facilmente di cambiare le sorti di una battaglia, in particolar modo quando dispiegata in gran numero.
TEXT.Spanish: While the crossbow may require more advanced technology than the bow, it does have significant advantages. Ease of use combined with considerable stopping power can easily make this weapon turn the tide of a battle, epecially when deployed in large numbers.

TEXT.English: Enslaved and trained to fight for other people's amusement, the life of the gladiator in the Mekaran arenas is hardly a pleasant one. However, despite it's hardships, it has it's appeal to some; the admiration of the crowds, good food and a clean bed, the occasional reward for a particularly spectacular show, and the promise of winning both your freedom and a well-paid position in the military all mean that the gladiator stables are rarely short on fresh bodies to choose from, even among the Mekara Order's free subjects.
TEXT.French: Enslaved and trained to fight for other people's amusement, the life of the gladiator in the Mekaran arenas is hardly a pleasant one. However, despite it's hardships, it has it's appeal to some; the admiration of the crowds, good food and a clean bed, the occasional reward for a particularly spectacular show, and the promise of winning both your freedom and a well-paid position in the military all mean that the gladiator stables are rarely short on fresh bodies to choose from, even among the Mekara Order's free subjects.
TEXT.German: Enslaved and trained to fight for other people's amusement, the life of the gladiator in the Mekaran arenas is hardly a pleasant one. However, despite it's hardships, it has it's appeal to some; the admiration of the crowds, good food and a clean bed, the occasional reward for a particularly spectacular show, and the promise of winning both your freedom and a well-paid position in the military all mean that the gladiator stables are rarely short on fresh bodies to choose from, even among the Mekara Order's free subjects.
TEXT.Italian: Ridotto in schiavitù e addestrato a combattere per il divertimento altrui non rende di certo piacevole la vita da gladiatore nelle arene Mekara. Tuttavia, nonostante tali difficoltà, ha il suo fascino per alcuni; l'ammirazione della folla, buon cibo e un letto pulito, l'occasionale ricompensa per un'esibizione ben riuscita, e la possibilità di vincere sia la libertà che una posizione ben retribuita nell'esercito unita a tutto il resto porta ad avere raramente penuria di persone tra cui scegliere, persino tra i sudditi liberi dell'Ordine Mekara.
TEXT.Spanish: Enslaved and trained to fight for other people's amusement, the life of the gladiator in the Mekaran arenas is hardly a pleasant one. However, despite it's hardships, it has it's appeal to some; the admiration of the crowds, good food and a clean bed, the occasional reward for a particularly spectacular show, and the promise of winning both your freedom and a well-paid position in the military all mean that the gladiator stables are rarely short on fresh bodies to choose from, even among the Mekara Order's free subjects.

TEXT.English: The Gladiator is a fast melee unit, specializing in attacking and defending cities. Every fight it wins will also generate culture for the nearest city. Recruiting the Gladiator unit requires that you have a Slave unit available. Once you do, placing it in a city with the Colosseum building lets it enter into the arena, granting it a promotion that holds it for a number of turns with a chance of it dying every turn. If it survives the games, it will change into a Gladiator.

Recruiting the Gladiator unit requires that you have a Slave unit available. Once you do, placing it in a city with the Colosseum building lets it enter into the arena, granting it a promotion that holds it for a number of turns with a chance of it dying every turn. If it survives the games, it will change into a Gladiator.

Once you do, placing it in a city with the Colosseum building lets it enter into the arena, granting it a promotion that holds it for a number of turns with a chance of it dying every turn. If it survives the games, it will change into a Gladiator.
TEXT.Italian: Il Gladiatore è una rapida unità da mischia, specializzata nell'attaccare e difendere città. Inoltre ogni combattimento che vince genera cultura per la città più vicina. Per reclutare un Gladiatore è necessario avere uno Schiavo, stanziarlo in una città con il Colosseo e farlo partecipare ai giochi. Ciò gli farà guadagnare una promozione che lo blocca per un certo numero di turni, ogni turno c'è una probabilità che venga ucciso. Se sopravvive ai giochi verrà trasformato in un Gladiatore.
TEXT.Spanish: The Gladiator is a fast melee unit, specializing in attacking and defending cities. Every fight it wins will also generate culture for the nearest city. Once you do, placing it in a city with the Colosseum building lets it enter into the arena, granting it a promotion that holds it for a number of turns with a chance of it dying every turn. If it survives the games, it will change into a Gladiator.

TEXT.English: The Ascended are the culmination of the Mekara Order's vision of creating a better human: They are stronger, faster and smarter than humans. They don't age, are resistant to magic, immune to diesease, and nearly invulnerable to damage, and have strong telekinetic powers. However, this transformation comes at a cost. The ritual required to bring about this change invariably corrupts the mind of the subject, leaving them with very few memories of their earlier life.
TEXT.French: The Ascended are the culmination of the Mekara Order's vision of creating a better human: They are stronger, faster and smarter than humans. They don't age, are resistant to magic, immune to diesease, and nearly invulnerable to damage, and have strong telekinetic powers. However, this transformation comes at a cost. The ritual required to bring about this change invariably corrupts the mind of the subject, leaving them with very few memories of their earlier life.
TEXT.German: The Ascended are the culmination of the Mekara Order's vision of creating a better human: They are stronger, faster and smarter than humans. The ritual required to bring about this change invariably corrupts the mind of the subject, leaving them with very few memories of their earlier life.
TEXT.Italian: Gli Ascesi sono il culmine della visione dell'Ordine Mekara per il miglioramento dell'essere umano: Sono più forti, più veloci e più intelligenti rispetto ai normali umani. Non invecchiano, sono resistenti alla magia, immuni alle malattie, sono quasi invulnerabili e hanno forti poteri telecinetici. Tuttavia, questa trasformazione non è priva di effetti negativi. Il rituale richiesto per la trasformazione corrompe invariabilmente la mente del soggetto, lasciandogli pochissimi ricordi della loro vità precedente.

The ritual required to bring about this change invariably corrupts the mind of the subject, leaving them with very few memories of their earlier life.

TEXT.English: Ascendants can be created, through a unit ability, from any unit of level 10 or above, once the Divine Essence tech has been researched. This creates an Ascendant unit, with no experience or promotions, ready to be used. [NEWLINE] Having access to rank 1 and 2 spells, as well as high strength and immortality, these units are a very powerful hybrid berween mages and Immortals. They also have a ranged attack, which can be upgraded at levels 8 and 12.
TEXT.French: Ascendants can be created, through a unit ability, from any unit of level 10 or above, once the Divine Essence tech has been researched. This creates an Ascendant unit, with no experience or promotions, ready to be used. [NEWLINE] Having access to rank 1 and 2 spells, as well as high strength and immortality, these units are a very powerful hybrid berween mages and Immortals. TEXT.Italian: Gli Ascesi possono venir creati, attraverso l'utilizzo di un'abilità, da qualsiasi unità di 10° livello o superiore, una volta scoperta la tecnologia Essenza Divina. Fare ciò crea un'unità Asceso, senza esperienza o promozioni, pronta all'uso. [NEWLINE] Avendo accesso a magie di 1° e 2° livello, oltre ad avere una forza elevata e Immortalità, li rende una potente via di mezzo tra maghi e Immortali. Hanno inoltre un attacco a distanza, che può essere migliorato al 8° e 12° livello.

They also have a ranged attack, which can be upgraded at levels 8 and 12.

TEXT.English: While many men hunt animals, for sport or for food, few men find similar pleasure in hunting other people. These men have made that hunt their life. They find criminals and bring them to justice, and 'procure' cheap labour where needed, all for a reasonable fee.
TEXT.French: While many men hunt animals, for sport or for food, few men find similar pleasure in hunting other people. These men have made that hunt their life. They find criminals and bring them to justice, and 'procure' cheap labour where needed, all for a reasonable fee.
TEXT.German: While many men hunt animals, for sport or for food, few men find similar pleasure in hunting other people. These men have made that hunt their life. They find criminals and bring them to justice, and 'procure' cheap labour where needed, all for a reasonable fee.
TEXT.Italian: Mentre molte persone cacciano gli animali, che sia per sport o per cibarsene, vi è un numero ristretto di persone che preferisce dare la caccia ai loro simili. Queste persone hanno fatto della caccia la loro vita. Esse trovano i criminali e li consegnao alla giustizia, e 'procurano' manodopera a basso costo quando necessario, tutto questo a un costo ragionevole.
TEXT.Spanish: While many men hunt animals, for sport or for food, few men find similar pleasure in hunting other people. These men have made that hunt their life. They find criminals and bring them to justice, and 'procure' cheap labour where needed, all for a reasonable fee.

TEXT.English: The Bounty Hunter and it's upgrade, the Slave Hunter, make up the main Recon line of the Mekara Order. They are the only professional military units the Mekara Order has access to, and unlike their equivalents in other civs, they are focused on fighting other troops, rather than animals and beasts. They trade the ability to capture animals for a chance to capture defeated enemies as slaves. The Slave Hunter can also pillage some enemy improvement for slaves.
TEXT.French: The Bounty Hunter and it's upgrade, the Slave Hunter, make up the main Recon line of the Mekara Order. They are the only professional military units the Mekara Order has access to, and unlike their equivalents in other civs, they are focused on fighting other troops, rather than animals and beasts. They trade the ability to capture animals for a chance to capture defeated enemies as slaves. The Slave Hunter can also pillage some enemy improvement for slaves.
TEXT.German: The Bounty Hunter and it's upgrade, the Slave Hunter, make up the main Recon line of the Mekara Order. They are the only professional military units the Mekara Order has access to, and unlike their equivalents in other civs, they are focused on fighting other troops, rather than animals and beasts. They trade the ability to capture animals for a chance to capture defeated enemies as slaves. The Slave Hunter can also pillage some enemy improvement for slaves.
TEXT.Italian: Il Cacciatore di Taglie e il suo upgrade, il Cacciatore di Schiavi, compongono la parte principale delle unità da ricognizione dell'Ordine Mekara. Sono le uniche unità militari professioniste disponibili all'Ordine Mekara e, diversamente dalle loro equivalenti delle altre civiltà, esse si concentrano nel combattere altre unità umane piuttosto che animali e bestie. Sostituiscono la capacità di catturare gli animali con la probabilità di catturare come schiavi i nemici sconfitti. Il Cacciatore di Schiavi può anche saccheggiare alcuni miglioramenti nemici per ottenere schiavi.
TEXT.Spanish: The Bounty Hunter and it's upgrade, the Slave Hunter, make up the main Recon line of the Mekara Order. They are the only professional military units the Mekara Order has access to, and unlike their equivalents in other civs, they are focused on fighting other troops, rather than animals and beasts. They also trade the ability to capture animals for a chance to capture defeated enemies as slaves. The Slave Hunter can also pillage some enemy improvement for slaves.

TEXT.English: The laboratories of the Mekara Order always need more test subjects, and it falls to these men to procure them - by any means neccessary. While regular bounty hunters deals with criminals and fugitives, these men take the craft to a whole new level. Large-scale raids on settlements, guerilla warfare, and even attacks on cities and fortresses are just some of the things these men will do to provide their masters with suitable materials with which to build the new human race.
TEXT.French: The laboratories of the Mekara Order always need more test subjects, and it falls to these men to procure them - by any means neccessary. While regular bounty hunters deals with criminals and fugitives, these men take the craft to a whole new level. TEXT.Italian: I laboratori dell'Ordine Mekara hanno sempre bisogno di nuovi soggetti per i test, e sono questi uomini che li procurano, con qualsiasi mezzo. Mentre i Cacciatori di Taglie hanno a che fare con criminali e fuggitivi, questi uomini portano la loro professione ad un altro livello. Incursioni su larga scala contro insediamenti, guerriglia, e persino attacchi contro città e fortezze sono solo alcune delle cose che questi uomini compiono per portare ai loro capi persone idonee con cui costruire una nuova razza umana.

TEXT.English: The Mekaran military is almost exclusively focused on hit-and-run warfare. This kind of strategy requires great coordination and tactical skill, which is something only a few can truly achieve. Those few that do almost invariably rise to become the commanders leading large-scale raids on the Order's enemies.
TEXT.French: The Mekaran military is almost exclusively focused on hit-and-run warfare. This kind of strategy requires great coordination and tactical skill, which is something only a few can truly achieve. Those few that do almost invariably rise to become the commanders leading large-scale raids on the Order's enemies.
TEXT.German: The Mekaran military is almost exclusively focused on hit-and-run warfare. Those few that do almost invariably rise to become the commanders leading large-scale raids on the Order's enemies.
TEXT.Italian: L'esercito Mekara si concentra quasi esclusivamente su tattiche mordi e fuggi. Questo tipo di strategia richiede una grande coordinazione e abilità tattica, caratteristiche che in pochi riescono a sviluppare. I pochi che ci riescono quasi sempre diventano i comandanti di incursioni su larga scala contro i nemici dell'Ordine.

TEXT.English: Fast, strong, and able to command a large number of units over a large area, the Raid Commander can turn the tide of any battle.
TEXT.French: Fast, strong, and able to command a large number of units over a large area, the Raid Commander can turn the tide of any battle.
TEXT.German: Fast, strong, and able to command a large number of units over a large area, the Raid Commander can turn the tide of any battle.
TEXT.Italian: Veloci, forti, e capaci di comandare un grande numero di unità a grande distanza, il Comandante dell'incursione può ribaltare l'esito di qualsiasi battaglia.
TEXT.Spanish: Fast, strong, and able to command a large number of units over a large area, the Raid Commander can turn the tide of any battle.

TEXT.English: Zaria Scheras was never your usual Calabim governor. Whereas most of her peers preferred to rule through intimidation and military strength, she always favoured a more subtle approach. Her Agents could be found in every city and village in her domain, strategically placed to find any and all who conspire against her. Highly skilled at avoiding detection, and strong enough to escape if they failed, Zaria often used them against her fellow Governors, to advance her political standing. With the coming of the Mekara Order and the establishment of the new Mekaran nation, their services are in more demand than ever, and their numbers have grown considerably. They have also found new ways to utilize their vampyric nature, drawing life from those they kill in battle, growing stronger with every foe they slay.
TEXT.French: Zaria Scheras was never your usual Calabim governor. Whereas most of her peers preferred to rule through intimidation and military strength, she always favoured a more subtle approach. Her Agents could be found in every city and village in her domain, strategically placed to find any and all who conspire against her. Highly skilled at avoiding detection, and strong enough to escape if they failed, Zaria often used them against her fellow Governors, to advance her political standing. With the coming of the Mekara Order and the establishment of the new Mekaran nation, their services are in more demand than ever, and their numbers have grown considerably. They have also found new ways to utilize their vampyric nature, drawing life from those they kill in battle, growing stronger with every foe they slay.
TEXT.German: Zaria Scheras was never your usual Calabim governor. Whereas most of her peers preferred to rule through intimidation and military strength, she always favoured a more subtle approach. Her Agents could be found in every city and village in her domain, strategically placed to find any and all who conspire against her. Highly skilled at avoiding detection, and strong enough to escape if they failed, Zaria often used them against her fellow Governors, to advance her political standing. With the coming of the Mekara Order and the establishment of the new Mekaran nation, their services are in more demand than ever, and their numbers have grown considerably. They have also found new ways to utilize their vampyric nature, drawing life from those they kill in battle, growing stronger with every foe they slay.
TEXT.Italian: Zaria Scheras non è mai stata la classica governatrice Calabim. Laddove i suoi pari preferivano governare attraverso l'intimidazione e la potenza militare lei ha sempre preferito un approccio più discreto. I suoi Agenti sono presenti in ogni città e villaggio dei suoi domini, in posizioni strategiche per scoprire chiunque conspiri contro di lei. Esperti nel non farsi scoprire, e sufficentemente forti per scappare se fallissero, Zaria li usava spesso contro gli altri governatori per migliorare la sua posizione. Con l'arrivo dell'Ordine Mekara e l'istituzione della nuova nazione Mekara i loro servizi sono più richiesti che mai, e i loro numeri sono cresciuti considerevolmente. Hanno inoltre trovato nuovi modi di utilizzare la loro natura vampirica, assorbendo la vita delle persone che uccidono in battaglia, diventando più forti con ogni nemico che uccidono.
TEXT.Spanish: Zaria Scheras was never your usual Calabim governor. Whereas most of her peers preferred to rule through intimidation and military strength, she always favoured a more subtle approach. Her Agents could be found in every city and village in her domain, strategically placed to find any and all who conspire against her. Highly skilled at avoiding detection, and strong enough to escape if they failed, Zaria often used them against her fellow Governors, to advance her political standing. With the coming of the Mekara Order and the establishment of the new Mekaran nation, their services are in more demand than ever, and their numbers have grown considerably. They have also found new ways to utilize their vampyric nature, drawing life from those they kill in battle, growing stronger with every foe they slay.

TEXT.English: Zaria's network of agents is almost entirely autonomous, with Zaria rarely taking an interest in their activities unless she wants some specific task done. When that happens, these men and women are the ones she calls upon. They are the most senior agents in the network, and the ones who are mostly running the operation. Their skills as assassins and spies is singular, and they are unquestioningly loyal to their mistress.
TEXT.French: Zaria's network of agents is almost entirely autonomous, with Zaria rarely taking an interest in their activities unless she wants some specific task done. When that happens, these men and women are the ones she calls upon. They are the most senior agents in the network, and the ones who are mostly running the operation. TEXT.Italian: La rete di agenti di Zaria è quasi completamente autonoma, con Zaria che raramente si interessa alle loro attività a meno che non voglia che una particolare azione venga compiuta. Quando ciò avviene questi uomini e donne sono coloro che chiama. Loro sono gli agenti più esperti, e anche quelli che si occupano principalmente dell'operazione. La loro abilità come assassini e spie è eccezionale, e sono indiscutibilmente leali alla loro signora.
TEXT.Spanish: Zaria's network of agents is almost entirely autonomous, with Zaria rarely taking an interest in their activities unless she wants some specific task done. When that happens, these men and women are the ones she calls upon. They are the most senior agents in the network, and the ones who are mostly running the operation. Their skills as assassins and spies is singular, and they are unquestioningly loyal to their mistress.

TEXT.English: The Caretakers are a organization of healers created by Zaria Scheras, in order to see to the needs of her subjects. This was in no way an altruistic act on her part, however. As she prefers to rule through love and deception, rather than fear and intimidation, she has made considerable efforts to make herself appear a generous and kind ruler in the eyes of her subjects. [PARAGRAPH:1]The Caretakers are highly trained in their craft, and carefully indoctrinated to spread the fable of the kind and just Zaria. They are also given some training in self-defence, as they often travel in the countryside, where the roads are not safe.

As she prefers to rule through love and deception, rather than fear and intimidation, she has made considerable efforts to make herself appear a generous and kind ruler in the eyes of her subjects. [PARAGRAPH:1]The Caretakers are highly trained in their craft, and carefully indoctrinated to spread the fable of the kind and just Zaria. TEXT.Italian: Le Infermiere sono un'organizzazione di guaritrici creata da Zaria Scheras, in modo da soddisfare i bisogni dei suoi sudditi. Questo, però, non è stato minimamente un atto d'altruismo da parte sua. In quanto lei preferisce governare attraverso l'amore e l'inganno piuttosto che la paura e l'intimidazione ha fatto parecchi sforzi per apparire ai suoi sudditi come una regnante generosa e gentile. [PARAGRAPH:1]Le Infermiere sono altamente istruite nella loro professione, e accuratamente indottrinate per diffondere la favola della gentile e giusta Zaria. Ricevono inoltre un minimo di addestramento per auto difesa, in quanto spesso girano per la nazione e le strade non sono sempre sicure.
TEXT.Spanish: The Caretakers are a organization of healers created by Zaria Scheras, in order to see to the needs of her subjects. This was in no way an altruistic act on her part, however. As she prefers to rule through love and deception, rather than fear and intimidation, she has made considerable efforts to make herself appear a generous and kind ruler in the eyes of her subjects. [PARAGRAPH:1]The Caretakers are highly trained in their craft, and carefully indoctrinated to spread the fable of the kind and just Zaria. They are also given some training in self-defence, as they often travel in the countryside, where the roads are not safe.

TEXT.English: In order to ensure that all Caretakers are her loyal and devoted servants, the higher orders of the organization - among others, the ones responsible for training - is exclusively made up of her vampyric servants. They conceal their nature from the citizens of the nation, while doing their outmost to project an image of benevolence and altruism. With few exceptions, they don't appear often in public, preferring to keep the company of those who are severely ill or dying. After all, noone would be too surprised if one of them died a bit ahead of schedule...

With few exceptions, they don't appear often in public, preferring to keep the company of those who are severely ill or dying. TEXT.Italian: Al fine di assicurarsi che tutte le Infermiere siano sue devote e fedeli servitrici tutti i ranghi più alti dell'organizzazione, tra cui quelli che si occupano dell'addestramento, sono ricoperti esclusivamente dalle sue servitrici vampiro. Esse nascondono la loro natura dai cittadini della nazione mentre fanno del loro meglio per proiettare un'immagine di altruismo e benevolenza. Con poche eccezioni, non appaiono spesso in pubblico, preferendo tenere compagnia a coloro che sono gravemente malati o morenti. Dopotutto, nessuno rimarrebbe sorpreso se uno di loro morisse un pò prima del previsto...
TEXT.Spanish: In order to ensure that all Caretakers are her loyal and devoted servants, the higher orders of the organization - among others, the ones responsible for training - is exclusively made up of her vampyric servants. They conceal their nature from the citizens of the nation, while doing their outmost to project an image of benevolence and altruism. After all, noone would be too surprised if one of them died a bit ahead of schedule...

TEXT.English: The core tenet of the Mekara Order is that of self-improvement through magic, and as such many it's initiates devote most their time to experimentation with different forms of life (mainly slaves, but also animals of different kinds), to, through controlled exposure to different types of mana or alchemical solutions, find methods to bring about such improvement.
TEXT.French: The core tenet of the Mekara Order is that of self-improvement through magic, and as such many it's initiates devote most their time to experimentation with different forms of life (mainly slaves, but also animals of different kinds), to, through controlled exposure to different types of mana or alchemical solutions, find methods to bring about such improvement.
TEXT.German: The core tenet of the Mekara Order is that of self-improvement through magic, and as such many it's initiates devote most their time to experimentation with different forms of life (mainly slaves, but also animals of different kinds), to, through controlled exposure to different types of mana or alchemical solutions, find methods to bring about such improvement.
TEXT.Italian: Il principio fondamentale dell'Ordine Mekara è quello del miglioramento personale attraverso la magia, pertanto molti dei suoi iniziati passano la maggior parte del loro tempo sperimentando con diverse forme di vita (principalmente schiavi, ma anche con animali di diversi tipi) per trovare modi per migliorarle, attraverso esposizioni controllate a diversi tipi di mana o soluzioni alchemiche.
TEXT.Spanish: The core tenet of the Mekara Order is that of self-improvement through magic, and as such many it's initiates devote most their time to experimentation with different forms of life (mainly slaves, but also animals of different kinds), to, through controlled exposure to different types of mana or alchemical solutions, find methods to bring about such improvement.

TEXT.English: While the Mekara Order is, in theory, ruled by it's current Master, in practice it is a mostly democratic organization, ruled by an elected council. Members of this council are known as High Mages, and are responsible for making sure that the Mekara Order's members can continue their research in resonable peace (and also to supervise them to make sure that no-one can betray the Mekara Order, like D'tesh did). The High Mages are almost exlusively Amurites, and tend to be the most powerful and talented of the Mekara Order's mages.
TEXT.French: While the Mekara Order is, in theory, ruled by it's current Master, in practice it is a mostly democratic organization, ruled by an elected council. Members of this council are known as High Mages, and are responsible for making sure that the Mekara Order's members can continue their research in resonable peace (and also to supervise them to make sure that no-one can betray the Mekara Order, like D'tesh did). The High Mages are almost exlusively Amurites, and tend to be the most powerful and talented of the Mekara Order's mages.
TEXT.German: While the Mekara Order is, in theory, ruled by it's current Master, in practice it is a mostly democratic organization, ruled by an elected council. Members of this council are known as High Mages, and are responsible for making sure that the Mekara Order's members can continue their research in resonable peace (and also to supervise them to make sure that no-one can betray the Mekara Order, like D'tesh did). The High Mages are almost exlusively Amurites, and tend to be the most powerful and talented of the Mekara Order's mages.
TEXT.Italian: Sebbene l'Ordine Mekara sia, in teoria, governato dal Maestro corrente, in pratica è un'organizzazione prevalentemente democratica, governata da un consiglio eletto. I membri di questo consiglio sono conosciuti come Maghi Supremi, e si assicurano che i membri dell'Ordine Mekara possano continuare le loro ricerche in pace (oltre a supervisionarli in modo da assicurarsi che nessuno tradisca l'Ordine Mekara come ha fatto D'tesh). I Maghi Supremi sono quasi esclusivamente Amurite, e tendono ad essere i più potenti e talentuosi maghi dell'Ordine Mekara.
TEXT.Spanish: While the Mekara Order is, in theory, ruled by it's current Master, in practice it is a mostly democratic organization, ruled by an elected council. Members of this council are known as High Mages, and are responsible for making sure that the Mekara Order's members can continue their research in resonable peace (and also to supervise them to make sure that no-one can betray the Mekara Order, like D'tesh did). The High Mages are almost exlusively Amurites, and tend to be the most powerful and talented of the Mekara Order's mages.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Turns the unit into a Gladiator, and enters it into the Arena.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]A Gladitorial Games building will be creted for the duration of the games, giving happiness and culture.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]The games have a 45% chance to end each turn: 20% through the unit dying, and 25% by the unit winning, in which case it becomes free to move again.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Turns the unit into a Gladiator, and enters it into the Arena.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]A Gladitorial Games building will be creted for the duration of the games, giving happiness and culture.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]The games have a 45% chance to end each turn: 20% through the unit dying, and 25% by the unit winning, in which case it becomes free to move again.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Turns the unit into a Gladiator, and enters it into the Arena.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]A Gladitorial Games building will be creted for the duration of the games, giving happiness and culture.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]The games have a 45% chance to end each turn: 20% through the unit dying, and 25% by the unit winning, in which case it becomes free to move again.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Trasforma l'unità in un Gladiatore, e la fa entrare nell'Arena.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Un edificio chiamato Giochi Gladiatori verrà creato per la durata dei giochi, che fornisce felicità e cultura.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Ogni turno i giochi hanno una probabilità del 45% di concludersi: 20% con la morte dell'unità, e 25% con la vittoria dell'unità, nel cui caso diventa di nuovo libera di muoversi.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Turns the unit into a Gladiator, and enters it into the Arena.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]A Gladitorial Games building will be creted for the duration of the games, giving happiness and culture.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]The games have a 45% chance to end each turn: 20% through the unit dying, and 25% by the unit winning, in which case it becomes free to move again.

TEXT.English: Slavery has always been a part of Calabim society to some extent; the Calabim nobility has never been very interested in basic human freedoms. The arrival of the Mekarans in Korash, and their subsequent rise to power, only exaserbated the problem. With harsh new laws and enslavement as a common punishment, the trade in slaves grew dramatically, becoming a central part of their economy. This resulted in slave markets cropping up in most larger settlements, with the so-called Fleshmarket in Deselen being the most significant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH]While a large portion of the slave trade is connected to the Order's mages, many of the wealthier citizens have also taken to owning slaves, resulting in a booming trade for bounty hunters and slavers.
TEXT.French: Slavery has always been a part of Calabim society to some extent; the Calabim nobility has never been very interested in basic human freedoms. The arrival of the Mekarans in Korash, and their subsequent rise to power, only exaserbated the problem. With harsh new laws and enslavement as a common punishment, the trade in slaves grew dramatically, becoming a central part of their economy. This resulted in slave markets cropping up in most larger settlements, with the so-called Fleshmarket in Deselen being the most significant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH]While a large portion of the slave trade is connected to the Order's mages, many of the wealthier citizens have also taken to owning slaves, resulting in a booming trade for bounty hunters and slavers.
TEXT.German: Slavery has always been a part of Calabim society to some extent; the Calabim nobility has never been very interested in basic human freedoms. The arrival of the Mekarans in Korash, and their subsequent rise to power, only exaserbated the problem. With harsh new laws and enslavement as a common punishment, the trade in slaves grew dramatically, becoming a central part of their economy. This resulted in slave markets cropping up in most larger settlements, with the so-called Fleshmarket in Deselen being the most significant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH]While a large portion of the slave trade is connected to the Order's mages, many of the wealthier citizens have also taken to owning slaves, resulting in a booming trade for bounty hunters and slavers.
TEXT.Italian: La schiavitù ha sempre fatto parte della società Calabim in una certa misura; la nobiltà Calabim non si è mai interessata alle basilari libertà umane. L'arrivo dei Mekara a Korash, e la loro successiva ascesa al potere, ha solo esacerbato il problema. Con la promulgazione di nuove rigide leggi e la schiavitù come punizione il commercio di schiavi crebbe notevolmente, divenendo una parte centrale della loro economia. Questo portò alla nascita di mercati di schiavi nella maggior parte degli insediamenti più grandi, con il cosidetto Mercato dei Corpi di Deselen che è il più conosciuto.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH]Sebbene un'ampia porzione del commercio di schiavi è collegata ai maghi dell'Ordine ci sono anche molti ricchi cittadini che hanno iniziato a possedere schiavi, che ha portato a un aumento degli affari per Cacciatori di taglie e Schiavisti.
TEXT.Spanish: Slavery has always been a part of Calabim society to some extent; the Calabim nobility has never been very interested in basic human freedoms. The arrival of the Mekarans in Korash, and their subsequent rise to power, only exaserbated the problem. With harsh new laws and enslavement as a common punishment, the trade in slaves grew dramatically, becoming a central part of their economy. This resulted in slave markets cropping up in most larger settlements, with the so-called Fleshmarket in Deselen being the most significant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH]While a large portion of the slave trade is connected to the Order's mages, many of the wealthier citizens have also taken to owning slaves, resulting in a booming trade for bounty hunters and slavers.

TEXT.English: While the Shapers of the Mekara Order are often thought of as monstrous, it is worth remembering that for many of them, the ultimate goal is the improvement of life for all humans, and that under Iram Damarr's guidance, they have come far indeed in fighting disease and illness. However, as anyone who have actually seen the inside of one of their laboratories will attest - they might strive to bring about a brave new world, but their methods are doubtlessly twisted.
TEXT.French: While the Shapers of the Mekara Order are often thought of as monstrous, it is worth remembering that for many of them, the ultimate goal is the improvement of life for all humans, and that under Iram Damarr's guidance, they have come far indeed in fighting disease and illness. However, as anyone who have actually seen the inside of one of their laboratories will attest - they might strive to bring about a brave new world, but their methods are doubtlessly twisted.
TEXT.German: While the Shapers of the Mekara Order are often thought of as monstrous, it is worth remembering that for many of them, the ultimate goal is the improvement of life for all humans, and that under Iram Damarr's guidance, they have come far indeed in fighting disease and illness. However, as anyone who have actually seen the inside of one of their laboratories will attest - they might strive to bring about a brave new world, but their methods are doubtlessly twisted.
TEXT.Italian: Anche se i Plasmatori dell'Ordine Mekara sono visti spesso come mostri vale la pena ricordare che per la maggior parte di loro l'obiettivo ultimo è il miglioramento della vita per tutti gli esseri umani, e che, sotto la guida di Iram Damarr, hanno effettivamente raggiunto grandi traguardi nella lotta alle malattie e infermità. Tuttavia chiunque abbia visto l'interno di uno dei loro laboratori può attestare che loro possono anche sforzarsi per creare un mondo migliore, ma che i loro metodi sono senza dubbio perversi.
TEXT.Spanish: While the Shapers of the Mekara Order are often thought of as monstrous, it is worth remembering that for many of them, the ultimate goal is the improvement of life for all humans, and that under Iram Damarr's guidance, they have come far indeed in fighting disease and illness. However, as anyone who have actually seen the inside of one of their laboratories will attest - they might strive to bring about a brave new world, but their methods are doubtlessly twisted.

TEXT.English: Violence and bloodshed will always hold a certain appeal for those who will never have to experience it firsthand. Since the Mekaran cities have such a large slave population bloodsport and gladitorial games were inevitable. [PARAGRAPH:1]They fill many functions: Entertainment for the people, military training for the soldiers, and a chance for commoners and slaves to improve their lives. If they survive, that is.
TEXT.French: Violence and bloodshed will always hold a certain appeal for those who will never have to experience it firsthand. Since the Mekaran cities have such a large slave population bloodsport and gladitorial games were inevitable. [PARAGRAPH:1]They fill many functions: Entertainment for the people, military training for the soldiers, and a chance for commoners and slaves to improve their lives. If they survive, that is.
TEXT.German: Gewalt und BlutvergieÃŸen wird immer eine besondere Anziehungskraft auf jene ausüben, die sie nicht aus erster Hand erfahren. Da die Mekaranischen Städte groÃŸe Sklavenmengen beherbergen, war die Entwicklung von Gladiatorenspielen letztendlich abzusehen und unausweichlich.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erfüllen viele Aufgaben: Unterhaltung für das Volk, Ausbildung für die Soldaten und die Chance für das gemeine Volk und Sklaven, in der Gesellschaft aufzusteigen. Natürlich nur, wenn man überlebt.
TEXT.Italian: La violenza e gli spargimenti di sangue hanno sempre un certo fascino per chi non dovrà mai sperimentarli in prima persona. Siccome le città dei Mekara hanno un cosi grande numero di schiavi sport sanguinosi e giochi gladiatori erano inevitabili. [PARAGRAPH:1]Questi soddisfano molte necessità: intrattenimento per la popolazione, addestramento per i soldati, e la possibilità per i cittadini comuni e gli schiavi di migliorare le loro vite. Se sopravvivono, ovviamente.
TEXT.Spanish: Violence and bloodshed will always hold a certain appeal for those who will never have to experience it firsthand. Since the Mekaran cities have such a large slave population bloodsport and gladitorial games were inevitable. [PARAGRAPH:1]They fill many functions: Entertainment for the people, military training for the soldiers, and a chance for commoners and slaves to improve their lives. If they survive, that is.

TEXT.English: The Colosseum replaces the Theatre building, providing reduced culture and losing some happiness bonuses. In exchange, it gives additional XP to all land units created in the city. Slaves can also be entered into gladitorial games, which provides a temporary happiness and culture boost, as well as having a chance of creating the Gladiator unit.
TEXT.French: The Colosseum replaces the Theatre building, providing reduced culture and losing some happiness bonuses. In exchange, it gives additional XP to all land units created in the city. Slaves can also be entered into gladitorial games, which provides a temporary happiness and culture boost, as well as having a chance of creating the Gladiator unit.
TEXT.German: Das Colosseum ersetzt das Gebäude Theater, es bringt etwas weniger Kultur und hat weniger Zufriedenheitsboni. Dafür gibt es jedoch allen, in dieser Stadt ausgebildeten, Landeinheiten zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte. Darüberhinaus können Sklaven in die Gladiatorenspiele "integriert" werden, was zu vrübergehender Zufriedenheit und Kulturzunahme führt. AuÃŸerdem besteht die Chance, daÃŸ dabei aus einem Sklaven eine Einheit Gladiator hervorgeht.
TEXT.Italian: Il Colosseo sostituisce il teatro, ma fornisce meno cultura e felicità. In compenso fornisce PE aggiuntivi a tutte le unità terrestri create in città. Gli Schiavi possono essere fatti entrare in giochi gladiatori, che forniscono felicità e cultura aggiuntivi temporanei, oltre ad avere la possibilità di creare l'unità Gladiatore.
TEXT.Spanish: The Colosseum replaces the Theatre building, providing reduced culture and losing some happiness bonuses. In exchange, it gives additional XP to all land units created in the city. Slaves can also be entered into gladitorial games, which provides a temporary happiness and culture boost, as well as having a chance of creating the Gladiator unit.

TEXT.English: This city is currently hosting gladitorial games. This spectacle will surely impress the people of the city!
TEXT.French: This city is currently hosting gladitorial games. This spectacle will surely impress the people of the city!
TEXT.German: Diese Stadt veranstaltet derzeit Gladiatorenspiele. Dieses Spektakel wird mit Sicherheit die Bewohner der Stadt beeindrucken!
TEXT.Italian: Questa città sta attualmente ospitando dei giochi gladiatori. Lo spettacolo impressionerà sicuramente la popolazione della città!
TEXT.Spanish: This city is currently hosting gladitorial games. This spectacle will surely impress the people of the city!

TEXT.English: The offices of the local Magistrates are central to every Mekaran settlement. It houses the bureaucratic machine that binds their society together; it organises the local militia; it is where the courts convene to settle legal disputes. Despite their importance, however, they tend to be grey, dull places.
TEXT.French: The offices of the local Magistrates are central to every Mekaran settlement. It houses the bureaucratic machine that binds their society together; it organises the local militia; it is where the courts convene to settle legal disputes. Despite their importance, however, they tend to be grey, dull places.
TEXT.German: Die Amtsitze der örtlichen Magistrate sind zentral in jeder Mekara Siedlung gelegen. Sie beherbergen die bürokratische Maschinerie, die ihre Gesellschaft zusammenhält. Sie organisieren die örtliche Miliz, klären an Gerichtstagen die juristischen Streitereien. Trotz ihrer Bedeutung sind es meist graue, glanzlose örtlichkeiten.
TEXT.Italian: Gli uffici dei Magistrati locali sono fondamentali per ogni insediamento Mekara. Essi ospitano la macchina burocratica che lega insieme la loro società; organizza la milizia locale; ed è dove i tribunali si riuniscono per risolvere le dispute legali. Eppure nonostante la loro importanza tendono ad essere luoghi grigi e scarni.
TEXT.Spanish: The offices of the local Magistrates are central to every Mekaran settlement. It houses the bureaucratic machine that binds their society together; it organises the local militia; it is where the courts convene to settle legal disputes. Despite their importance, however, they tend to be grey, dull places.

TEXT.English: The Slave Pens building provides additional production to a city, as well as allowing it to construct Sluga. It also allows the player to settle captured slaves as Citizen specialists, increasing production further.
TEXT.French: The Slave Pens building provides additional production to a city, as well as allowing it to construct Sluga. It also allows the player to settle captured slaves as Citizen specialists, increasing production further.
TEXT.German: Die Sklavenquartiere erzeugen zusätzliche Produktion in der Stadt, auÃŸerdem erlauben sie die Erschaffung von Sluga. Es macht auch die Eingliederung von gefangenen Sklaven als spezialisierte Bürger möglich, wodurch die Produktion weiter ansteigen kann.
TEXT.Italian: L'edificio Baracche degli Schiavi fornisce produzione aggiuntiva alla città, oltre a permettere la creazione di Sluga. Permette inoltre di assegnare Schiavi alla città come specialisti, aumentandone la produzione ulteriormente.
TEXT.Spanish: The Slave Pens building provides additional production to a city, as well as allowing it to construct Sluga. It also allows the player to settle captured slaves as Citizen specialists, increasing production further.

TEXT.English: Slavery is often frowned upon by society, despite the fact that many of the world's nations practice it in one form or another - prison labour, for instance. Despite it being disliked, it does have some benefits; it provides a less final punishment to those who commit capital crimes, it provides the authorities with cheap labour, and it gives a very visible way of showing people what happens to those who don't follow the law.
TEXT.French: Slavery is often frowned upon by society, despite the fact that many of the world's nations practice it in one form or another - prison labour, for instance. Despite it being disliked, it does have some benefits; it provides a less final punishment to those who commit capital crimes, it provides the authorities with cheap labour, and it gives a very visible way of showing people what happens to those who don't follow the law.
TEXT.German: Sklaverei wird von der Gesellschaft oft missbilligt, trotz der Tatsache, dass viele Völker der Welt sie auf die eine oder die andere Art praktizieren - Zwangsarbeit, beispielsweise. Obwohl sie nicht besonders beliebt ist, ist sie doch sehr nützlich. Für Schwerverbecher ist sie eine nicht ganz so endgültige Strafe wie der Tod, sie versorgt die Oberen mit billiger Arbeitskraft und zeigt den Leuten auf sehr anschauliche Weise, was passiert, wenn sie sich nicht an die Gesetze halten.
TEXT.Italian: La schiavitù è spesso malvista dalla società, nonostante il fatto che venga praticata da molte nazioni del mondo anche se in forme differenti, come il lavoro forzato per esempio. Anche se non piace essa porta dei vantaggi: una punizione meno definitiva per chi compie crimini capitali, da accesso alle autorità a manodopera a basso costo ed è una maniera molto visibile con cui mostrare cosa succede a chi non segue la legge.
TEXT.Spanish: Slavery is often frowned upon by society, despite the fact that many of the world's nations practice it in one form or another - prison labour, for instance. Despite it being disliked, it does have some benefits; it provides a less final punishment to those who commit capital crimes, it provides the authorities with cheap labour, and it gives a very visible way of showing people what happens to those who don't follow the law.

TEXT.English: As much a place of experimentation and discovery as a place for mages to be trained in their craft, the Shaper Cabal provides one of the few ways to truly advance in Mekaran society. Though they are the sites of many of the experiments that give the Order its dark reputation, the Mekaran people still flock towards them, hoping to be taken on as apprentices.
TEXT.French: As much a place of experimentation and discovery as a place for mages to be trained in their craft, the Shaper Cabal provides one of the few ways to truly advance in Mekaran society. Though they are the sites of many of the experiments that give the Order its dark reputation, the Mekaran people still flock towards them, hoping to be taken on as apprentices.
TEXT.German: As much a place of experimentation and discovery as a place for mages to be trained in their craft, the Shaper Cabal provides one of the few ways to truly advance in Mekaran society. Though they are the sites of many of the experiments that give the Order its dark reputation, the Mekaran people still flock towards them, hoping to be taken on as apprentices.
TEXT.Italian: Tanto un luogo di sperimentazione e scoperta quanto un luogo per i maghi in cui addestrarsi nella loro arte, la Cabala del Plasmatore fornisce uno dei pochi modi con cui poter veramente scalare la società Mekara. Sebbene siano i siti di molti degli esperimenti che danno all'Ordine la sua tetra reputazione il popolo Mekara continua ad accorrervi, nella speranza di essere presi come apprendisti.
TEXT.Spanish: As much a place of experimentation and discovery as a place for mages to be trained in their craft, the Shaper Cabal provides one of the few ways to truly advance in Mekaran society. Though they are the sites of many of the experiments that give the Order its dark reputation, the Mekaran people still flock towards them, hoping to be taken on as apprentices.

TEXT.English: A volonteer militia drawn together by Iram Damarr, the Custodians are better trained and more organized than the regular standing forces of the Mekara nation.
TEXT.French: A volonteer militia drawn together by Iram Damarr, the Custodians are better trained and more organized than the regular standing forces of the Mekara nation.

TEXT.Spanish: A volonteer militia drawn together by Iram Damarr, the Custodians are better trained and more organized than the regular standing forces of the Mekara nation.

TEXT.English: With extensive training and experience at both hunting and war, these highly skilled archers are a deadly force on any battlefield.
TEXT.French: With extensive training and experience at both hunting and war, these highly skilled archers are a deadly force on any battlefield.
TEXT.German: With extensive training and experience at both hunting and war, these highly skilled archers are a deadly force on any battlefield.
TEXT.Italian: Con un ampio allenamento ed esperienza sia nella caccia che nella guerra questi abili arcieri sono letali su qualsiasi campo di battaglia.
TEXT.Spanish: With extensive training and experience at both hunting and war, these highly skilled archers are a deadly force on any battlefield.

TEXT.English: However you look at it, the core creed of the Mekara Order is the fulfilment of human potential, and the expansion of its innate abilities. Most of the Order's members take the position that the end goal is all that is relevant, but some would argue otherwise. Iram Damarr is one of those who do. Not content to wait or search for the final form of humanity promised by the Order, he has begun using the extensive body of knowledge regarding human enhancement to gradually improve the human condition. With volunteers from the civilian population and the militia, he has given rise to the Aspirant - an enhanced human being that is the stepping stone towards true Ascension.
TEXT.French: However you look at it, the core creed of the Mekara Order is the fulfilment of human potential, and the expansion of its innate abilities. Most of the Order's members take the position that the end goal is all that is relevant, but some would argue otherwise. Iram Damarr is one of those who do. Not content to wait or search for the final form of humanity promised by the Order, he has begun using the extensive body of knowledge regarding human enhancement to gradually improve the human condition. With volunteers from the civilian population and the militia, he has given rise to the Aspirant - an enhanced human being that is the stepping stone towards true Ascension.
TEXT.German: However you look at it, the core creed of the Mekara Order is the fulfilment of human potential, and the expansion of its innate abilities. Most of the Order's members take the position that the end goal is all that is relevant, but some would argue otherwise. Iram Damarr is one of those who do. Not content to wait or search for the final form of humanity promised by the Order, he has begun using the extensive body of knowledge regarding human enhancement to gradually improve the human condition. With volunteers from the civilian population and the militia, he has given rise to the Aspirant - an enhanced human being that is the stepping stone towards true Ascension.
TEXT.Italian: L'obiettivo dell'Ordine Mekara è il raggiungimento dell'apice del potenziale umano e l'espansione delle sue capacità innate. La maggior parte dei membri dell'Ordine ritiene che l'unica cosa rilevante sia il raggiungimento di tale obiettivo, mentre altri sostengono il contrario. Iram Damarr è uno di loro. Non intenzionato ad aspettare o cercare la forma finale promessa dall'Ordine ha iniziato ad usare la grande mole di conoscenza relativa al potenziamento del corpo umano per migliorare gradualmente la condizione umana. Con volontari provenienti dalla popolazione civile e dalla milizia ha dato origine all'Aspirante, un'essere umano potenziato che è il primo passo verso la vera Ascensione.
TEXT.Spanish: However you look at it, the core creed of the Mekara Order is the fulfilment of human potential, and the expansion of its innate abilities. Most of the Order's members take the position that the end goal is all that is relevant, but some would argue otherwise. Iram Damarr is one of those who do. Not content to wait or search for the final form of humanity promised by the Order, he has begun using the extensive body of knowledge regarding human enhancement to gradually improve the human condition. With volunteers from the civilian population and the militia, he has given rise to the Aspirant - an enhanced human being that is the stepping stone towards true Ascension.

TEXT.English: The Aspirant is Iram Damarr's signature unit. Sharing many characteristics with the Grigori Adventurer, it is a unit that can be upgraded into any other unit, spawned through a civilization counter, at a rate determined by the amount of Shaper Cabals and Laboratories present in the empire. In addition to the normal abilities of the unit it is promoted into, it also has a number of innate enhancements, determined by Iram's traits.
TEXT.French: The Aspirant is Iram Damarr's signature unit. Sharing many characteristics with the Grigori Adventurer, it is a unit that can be upgraded into any other unit, spawned through a civilization counter, at a rate determined by the amount of Shaper Cabals and Laboratories present in the empire. In addition to the normal abilities of the unit it is promoted into, it also has a number of innate enhancements, determined by Iram's traits.
TEXT.German: The Aspirant is Iram Damarr's signature unit. Sharing many characteristics with the Grigori Adventurer, it is a unit that can be upgraded into any other unit, spawned through a civilization counter, at a rate determined by the amount of Shaper Cabals and Laboratories present in the empire. In addition to the normal abilities of the unit it is promoted into, it also has a number of innate enhancements, determined by Iram's traits.
TEXT.Italian: L'Aspirante è l'unità distintiva di Iram Damarr. Essa condivide molti tratti con l'Avventuriero Grigori, può venir migliorata in qualsiasi altra unità e viene generata attraverso un contatore specifico ad un ritmo determinato dal numero di Cabale e Laboratori del Plasmatore presenti nell'impero. In aggiunta alle normali capacità dell'unità in cui viene migliorata possiede anche dei potenziamenti innati determinati dai tratti di Iram.
TEXT.Spanish: The Aspirant is Iram Damarr's signature unit. Sharing many characteristics with the Grigori Adventurer, it is a unit that can be upgraded into any other unit, spawned through a civilization counter, at a rate determined by the amount of Shaper Cabals and Laboratories present in the empire. In addition to the normal abilities of the unit it is promoted into, it also has a number of innate enhancements, determined by Iram's traits.
